resources.string: Participate in coastal clean-ups and reduce plastic use to keep our beaches and ocean clean. Trash in the ocean can harm sea turtles and other creatures that live there.
Click me to learn more online:

Turtles are struggling every day due to unnatural pollution caused by humans. We can are a nonprofit organization that has certified staff to take care of sea turtles that almost lost their lives and giving them a second chance to live. You guys can help too!
